title: Nairo Quintana spotted at the Vuelta a España, this time as a fan and holding out hope for a 2024 contract
content:
The Colombian remains without a team after Arkéa-Samsic dropped him for using the painkiller tramadol last year.

Read the full article at Nairo Quintana spotted at the Vuelta a España, this time as a fan and holding out hope for a 2024 contract on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
